org.jppf.client

Interface JPPFClientConnection

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ClientConnectionStatusHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractJPPFClientConnection, BaseJPPFClientConnection, JPPFClientConnectionImpl

    public interface JPPFClientConnection
extends ClientConnectionStatusHandler
    Interface for a client connection to a JPPF driver.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<JPPFJob> close()
      Shutdown this client and retrieve all pending executions for resubmission.
      String getConnectionUuid()
      Get the unique ID for this connection and its two channels.
      String getDriverUuid()
      Get the unique identifier of the remote driver.
      String getHost()
      Get the driver's host name or ip address.
      JMXDriverConnectionWrapper getJmxConnection()
      Get the object that provides access to the management functions of the driver.
      String getName()
      Get the name assigned to this client connection.
      int getPort()
      Get the port number on which the dirver is listeneing for connections.
      int getPriority()
      Get the priority assigned to this connection.
      JPPFSystemInformation getSystemInfo()
      Get the system information.
      void init()
      Initialize this client connection.
      boolean isClosed()
      Determine whether this connection was closed.
      boolean isSSLEnabled()
      Determines if this connection is over SSL.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.jppf.client.event.ClientConnectionStatusHandler

        addClientConnectionStatusListener, getStatus, removeClientConnectionStatusListener, setStatus

      • init

        void init()
        Initialize this client connection.

      • getPriority

        int getPriority()
        Get the priority assigned to this connection.
        Returns:
        a priority as an int value.

      • close

        List<JPPFJob> close()
        Shutdown this client and retrieve all pending executions for resubmission.
        Returns:
        a list of JPPFJob instances to resubmit.

      • isClosed

        boolean isClosed()
        Determine whether this connection was closed.
        Returns:
        true if the connection is closed, false otherwise.

        String getName()
        Get the name assigned to this client connection.
        Returns:
        the name as a string.

      • isSSLEnabled

        boolean isSSLEnabled()
        Determines if this connection is over SSL.
        Returns:
        true if this is an SSL connection, false otherwise.

        Get the driver's host name or ip address.

        Returns:

        Get the unique identifier of the remote driver.
        Returns:

      • getJmxConnection
